notesStmt.note: Yaḥya ibn Salam Alzabib and Musa ben Yeḥiel Alzabib: inscribed, folio 1r.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The book of Samuel and Kings, with Targum in alternate verses, accentuated and punctuated, with masorah magna and parva.

collation.p: 18 quires of 10 leaves each, divided into two parts of 9 quires each and numbered separately in Hebrew letters on the first page. Quire 9 and 18 are not full.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite square script, punctuated and accentuated, of the 16th century.
